Add links description: Add PT-BR Wiki template page hyperlinks to the template names found in the translated text.
Split data template description: Add links to both the template page and to the date itself.
Date rsw description: Clicking on a {{Data}} also opens the given PT-BR Wiki date page.
Date rsw addendum: Requires pop-up windows to be enabled in the browser.
Remove text addendum: Doesn't include templates or their untranslated parameters and values.
Highlight untranslated description: Marks unchanged text after translation with a different color.
Differentiate examines description: Differentiates examine highlighting from the other untranslated parts.
Differentiate navboxes description: Differentiates navbox highlighting from the other untranslated parts.
Differentiate categories description: Differentiates category highlighting from the other untranslated parts.
Retranslate description: Shows a button in the text input to execute translation again.
Debugger description: Toggles the exibition of all variables in the browser's console during translation.
Debugger splitted: Shows in the debugger the variable 'splitted' during translation.
Debugger template: Shows in the debugger info about each template found during translation.
Debugger success description: Shows in the debugger successfuly-handled irregularities during translation.
Debugger skipped description: Shows in the debugger lines of text purposely ignored during translation.
Debugger errors description: Shows in the debugger lines that get skipped during translation due to lack/non-existance of data.
